effect.sword_shield: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages.

effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages.
effect.legends_arceus: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages.

short_effect.sword_shield: Lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: Lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.
short_effect.the_crown_tundra: Lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.
short_effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.
short_effect.legends_arceus: Lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.sword_shield: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack's recoil harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.
